title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your commitment to increased competence in a hobby or creative pursuit yields exciting new gains today. If you direct consistent effort toward an avocation, it only makes sense that someone else takes notice. Although Saturn is stern as he travels through your 5th House of Creativity now, he is always fair. Whatever you put in, you can get out. Working harder and smarter, as well as investing more resources into what you enjoy, is a formula for satisfaction and success. Follow your passion and find your purpose. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
